Nah fuck off. It was a bussiness decision, what if you leave you have to sign with the Suns or your rings arent any good. There is a limited number of teams able to compete, like 4 probably, with him that number rises to like 7 when you add the Clips, Raps, and us. A million things goes in a decision, coaches, staff, city, crowd, moving etc. Its not like he joined the Third Reich with Hitler at the point and Mein Kampf as the playbook, he simply went to a team where it would be easiest to win a ring, since he has been struggling his whole life, as you hear in his MVP speech. With all that being said, fuck him for not signing with us, other than that, a perfectly okay decision.

A national team game, Montenegro vs England. My first game in the stands in my life, we were in second place and losing 2-0 at home. Scored 1 at the end of the half, and then news broke in that Wales were winning against Switzerland so we only needed a point to get through to the playoff in the qualifiers. Spent the whole time attacking and then scored in stoppage time to make it 2-2.[Probably the greatest game in the history of our national team.](https://youtu.be/KVrDWZs3PtA)
